name: Jitender Swami
about: Software Development Engineer at ApnaTime Tech | M.Tech in Industrial Engineering & Management from IIT Kharagpur | Specializing in creating innovative tech solutions to enhance user experiences. My expertise includes JavaScript, React.js, and leveraging AI for operational efficiency and customer engagement.

positions.subtitle: apna
positions.description: ● Engineered a streamlined authentication system with modal-based login accessible site-wide, reducing login time by 78% and eliminatingredundant redirects, enhancing user experience while improving codebase maintainability and simplifying overall web login architecture.● Single handly developed a microsite for SVIP under tight deadlines; leveraged this foundation to develop CANVAS, an enterprise-levelhackathon platform. Demonstrated code reusability by adapting the initial template, resulting in 3-4 days of saved development effort.● Engineered a Creator Dashboard, the dashboard’s key features included secure creator authorization, an intuitive post-creation page, anda versatile analytics dashboard, providing creators with actionable insights to optimize their content strategies and improve audience reach.● Spearheaded Xclusives webpage; integrated Strapi CMS, automating event management and registration.This initiative reduced Ops teammanpower by 66% (from three to one), while enhancing operational efficiency and improving candidate engagement and website traffic.● Led a 3-person team in developing CANVAS, a comprehensive hackathon platform. Architected candidate-facing features (registration,team formation, multi-round assessments) and enterprise tools (demographic analytics, submission evaluation), driving company's expansion into the hackathon market.
positions.title: Software Engineer 2
positions.description_html:
● Engineered a streamlined authentication system with modal-based login accessible site-wide, reducing login time by 78% and eliminating
redundant redirects, enhancing user experience while improving codebase maintainability and simplifying overall web login architecture.
● Single handly developed a microsite for SVIP under tight deadlines; leveraged this foundation to develop CANVAS, an enterprise-level
hackathon platform. Demonstrated code reusability by adapting the initial template, resulting in 3-4 days of saved development effort.
● Engineered a Creator Dashboard, the dashboard’s key features included secure creator authorization, an intuitive post-creation page, and
a versatile analytics dashboard, providing creators with actionable insights to optimize their content strategies and improve audience reach.
● Spearheaded Xclusives webpage; integrated Strapi CMS, automating event management and registration.This initiative reduced Ops team
manpower by 66% (from three to one), while enhancing operational efficiency and improving candidate engagement and website traffic.
● Led a 3-person team in developing CANVAS, a comprehensive hackathon platform. Architected candidate-facing features (registration,
team formation, multi-round assessments) and enterprise tools (demographic analytics, submission evaluation), driving company's expansion into the hackathon market.

positions.subtitle: apna
positions.description: 1. Developed & automated the Sales-Assisted Buy Coin Flow, significantly enhancing user experience for coin purchases and payments, the flow improved sales team efficiency by streamlining order management and payment tracking, leading to better operational effectiveness.2. Contributed to cross-functional team success in delivering a user-friendly Enterprise Client dashboard with seamless UI integration.3. Refactored the Monetization codebase to improve readability and maintainability, aligning with business and product needs. Enhanced pageperformance by 5% through Lazy Loading & minimizing unnecessary re-renders, delivering a more efficient & responsive user experience.
positions.title: Software Engineer 1
positions.description_html:
1. Developed & automated the Sales-Assisted Buy Coin Flow, significantly enhancing user experience for coin purchases and payments, the flow improved sales team efficiency by streamlining order management and payment tracking, leading to better operational effectiveness.
2. Contributed to cross-functional team success in delivering a user-friendly Enterprise Client dashboard with seamless UI integration.
3. Refactored the Monetization codebase to improve readability and maintainability, aligning with business and product needs. Enhanced page
performance by 5% through Lazy Loading & minimizing unnecessary re-renders, delivering a more efficient & responsive user experience.

experience.title: NLP Intern
experience.description: •Upgraded the AllenNLP-based UDIFY model for universal part-of-speech tagging, dependency parsing, and morphological features.• Developed ML models to extract semantics from the Universal Dependency Treebank dataset, achieving an accuracy rate of 97.5%.• Analysed and labeled English Universal Dependency Treebank data with location and time information to empower semantic extraction.
experience.description_html: •Upgraded the AllenNLP-based UDIFY model for universal part-of-speech tagging, dependency parsing, and morphological features.• Developed ML models to extract semantics from the Universal Dependency Treebank dataset, achieving an accuracy rate of 97.5%.• Analysed and labeled English Universal Dependency Treebank data with location and time information to empower semantic extraction. <!---->

experience.title: AI Research And Development Intern
experience.description: • Conducted research and implemented various Adversarial Attacks on Machine Learning models.• Investigated and applied Empirical Robustness and Loss Sensitivity scores for Convolutional Neural Networks, as well as Verified Error and Average Robustness scores for Tree-based classifiers to quantify the impact of Adversarial Attacks.• Employed preprocessing mitigations and defensive techniques, including Feature Squeezing, Gaussian Data Augmentation, and Spatial Smoothing, to protect Machine Learning models trained on both structured and unstructured datasets.
experience.description_html: • Conducted research and implemented various Adversarial Attacks on Machine Learning models.• Investigated and applied Empirical Robustness and Loss Sensitivity scores for Convolutional Neural Networks, as well as Verified Error and Average Robustness scores for Tree-based classifiers to quantify the impact of Adversarial Attacks.• Employed preprocessing mitigations and defensive techniques, including Feature Squeezing, Gaussian Data Augmentation, and Spatial Smoothing, to protect Machine Learning models trained on both structured and unstructured datasets.

experience.title: Healthcare Data Analyst
experience.description: • Conducted thorough analysis and preprocessing of a raw dataset comprising cancer patient records, focusing on tumor size and the impact of prescribed treatment drugs.• Employed Google Colab for Transfer Learning and Fine-tuning, utilizing a pre-trained ResNet50 model on the NIH ChestX-ray dataset.
experience.description_html: • Conducted thorough analysis and preprocessing of a raw dataset comprising cancer patient records, focusing on tumor size and the impact of prescribed treatment drugs.• Employed Google Colab for Transfer Learning and Fine-tuning, utilizing a pre-trained ResNet50 model on the NIH ChestX-ray dataset. <!---->

projects: [{"title":"Unsupervised learning techniques with partition based K - Means Algorthim","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Independently implemented the K-means algorithm without external libraries, applying it to gain insights from a cancer dataset.• Computed cluster quality metrics to determine the optimal value of the hyperparameter K, representing the desired number of clusters.• Evaluated the performance of the K-means clustering technique through the application of the Elbow method and Silhouette analysis."},{"title":"Optimization and Remodelling of Laboratory at the Department ","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"•Enhanced the layout of the laboratory by optimizing the arrangement of furniture, projectors, and computers while considering spatial constraints and location factors.•Designed the lab layout using Google SketchUp, prioritizing efficient traffic flow, and accessibility for both teachers and students and strategically positioning computers and projectors for effective use."}]
